results.text: Any false information or fake items that you swapped out for the original in the last 24 hours is easily traceable back to you.
For the next minute, any creature who attempts to search your person for contraband automatically succeeds in finding one illegal item (as determined by the Narrator).
Word travels fast, and the person who caught you in the act is doing their part. Merchants and guards are more likely to recognize you on the street for the next 24 hours.
You drop the item you are currently trying to plant or pickpocket onto the floor. Creatures within 10 feet of you are immediately alerted to your presence and intentions.
Your fingers or hand becomes entangled or otherwise trapped by some unseen obstacle in someone’s pocket, a hole, or other container. You are grappled until the start of your next turn.
Even your spritely tendons have their limits, and you’ve reached them. Your next Sleight of Hand check is made at disadvantage.
